snippet.title: Geek Trivia: May the Farce be with you
snippet.description: Which fan-favorite character debuted in the infamous 1978 Star Wars Holiday Special?

snippet.title: Mr Playboy himself turns 80
snippet.description: Totally overshadowing my miniscule milestone of 65 years, was Hugh Hefner's 80th birthday on April 9. Still going strong, this is the man who LIVED every man's fantasies. My only...
